attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: THERE ARE TOO MANY SETS OF TRAFFIC LIGHTS ON THE ROADS, WHICH IN MY VIEW CREATES CONGESTION, WHICH MEANS NO FLOW,THEY ARE BEING PUT UP EVERYWHERE ALL OVER THE UK AND AT WHAT COST, HOW MUCH IS A SET OF NEW TRAFFIC LIGHTS AND WHO PAYS FOR THEM, ARE THERE ANY NEW ONES BEING PUT UP IN YOUR AREA, MULTIPLY THE AMOUNT OF SETS BEING PUT UP AGAINST THE COST OF EACH SET, LOADS OF WASTED MONEY ALL IN THE NAME OF SAFETY, SOMEBODY IS MAKING A PACKET OUT OF THIS.

rejection.details: The title of a petition should be a request for action. Please also use upper and lower case.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
